body:
When run spack install petsc, I encounter the following error:

>   760       from _weakref import (
>   761   ImportError: cannot import name _remove_dead_weakref
>   762   gmake[2]: *** No rule to make target `arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/petsc/conf/files', needed by `all'.  Stop.
title: Error: cannot import name _remove_dead_weakref
